title: Моя країна — Україна
overview: The project "MY COUNTRY IS UKRAINE" is a series of animated films created by young directors, animators, and artists.The series is created by NOVATORFILM Studio with the support of the State Cinematography Service.Each 3-minute episode tells a well-known or forgotten fairy tale, story, legend of a specific place in Ukraine, whether it is a big city or a small village, a field or the sea.
